name: 嚴佳茹
objective:
本課程主要教授在建築上之節約能源設計之理念、技術、法規及案例分析等，授課內容包含：1. 建築節約能源導論 2. 建築能源對策 3. 建築外殼節能設計 4. 建築空調節能設計 5. 建築採光與照明節能設計 6. ENVLOAD 之應用 7. 綠建築之發展 8. 節能案例解說與分析 9. 相關法令解說
This course is focus on the concept technique law and case study about Energy Conservation Design of Architecture .It major content includes :1. Introduction about Architecture's Energy Conservation.2. Impact of Architecture's Energy Conservation.3. Envelope Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.4. Air Conditional Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.5. Lighting and Illumination of Architecture's Energy Conservation.6. Application of Envelope Design.7. Development of Green Architecture.8. Illustration and Analysis of Case study.9. Relative Law and Regulations.
